title: Chat Buddies
description: Real-time Messaging: Utilizes Socket.io for real-time communication, ensuring instant message delivery and live updates between users
Robust Authentication: Implements JWT and Cookie Parser for secure authentication and authorization, protecting user data and ensuring privacy
State Management: Uses Zustand for efficient and scalable state management, enhancing performance and ease of state handling in the application.
Responsive Design: Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI are employed to create a responsive and visually appealing user interface, providing a seamless user experience across different devices.
Scalable Backend: Built with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, the backend is designed to handle high traffic and large volumes of data, ensuring scalability and reliability

title: Inhouse Trouble Ticketing tool
description: Built a responsive frontend using React.js and Material-UI for a seamless user experience and java,spring boot for backend.
Implemented messaging with Apache Kafka to ensure reliable communication between services.
Utilized MySQL for database management and H2 for local testing.
Integrated Camunda for workflow and business process management.
Ensured high performance and scalability of the application through efficient coding and system design.
